cosmos.question: I shine bright in the night sky, but I'm not a star. I travel around the Earth. What am I?

hints.text: 🌕 Sometimes I'm full, sometimes I'm just a sliver.
🧀 People sometimes say I'm made of cheese!
🌎 I orbit a big, blue planet.

cosmos.question: I am big and hot and give light to the Earth. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I am a giant ball of burning gas.
😎 Don't look directly at me; I'm very bright!
🌻 Plants need me to grow.

cosmos.question: I am a big ball of rock that travels around the Sun. I am also where you live. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I am mostly covered in water.
🏠 You can find your home on me.
🌍 I have continents like North America and Europe.

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that make a picture in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: ursa 🐻 Some of them are named after animals, like a bear.
✨ You can see me best on a clear night away from city lights.
📜 Ancient people told stories about the shapes I make.

cosmos.question: I am a cold, rocky body that orbits the sun. Sometimes I have a tail.

hints.text: ❄️ I am made of ice, dust, and rock.
☄️ I become visible when I get closer to the Sun.
💨 My tail always points away from the Sun.

cosmos.question: I am the red planet. What am I?

hints.text: 🍫 I'm named after the Roman god of war.
🤖 People have sent robots to explore me.
🏜️ I have the largest volcano in the solar system.

cosmos.question: I am the largest planet in our solar system. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I have a giant red spot.
💨 I am a gas giant.
🛰️ Many moons orbit me.

cosmos.question: I am a very, very big group of stars, dust, and gas, held together by gravity. Our solar system is part of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I'm shaped like a spiral.
🌃 When you look up at night, you're seeing part of me!
✨ I contain billions of stars.

cosmos.question: I am a place in space where gravity is so strong that nothing, not even light, can escape. What am I?

hints.text: ⚫️ I am invisible.
🕳️ I can suck up anything that gets too close.
🤯 I am formed from the death of a massive star.

cosmos.question: I am a huge cloud of gas and dust in space where stars are born. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I can be very colorful.
👶 Stars are born inside me.
🌌 I am made of hydrogen, helium, and other ionized gases.

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. I love peanuts. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐘 I'm a very large animal.
🥜 I'm often seen at the circus.
💧 I can use my nose as a hose.

animal.question: I say 'Meow' and love to chase mice. I purr when I'm happy. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐈‍⬛ I'm a common house pet.
🥛 I love to drink milk.
🧶 I like to play with yarn.

animal.question: I have a long neck and eat leaves from tall trees. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦒 I am the tallest mammal on Earth.
🌍 You can find me in Africa.
🍃 I love to eat acacia leaves.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes and live in Africa. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 I look a bit like a horse.
🚦 My stripes help me hide in tall grass.
🌱 I eat grass and plants.

animal.question: I croak and hop and like to swim in ponds. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐸 I start as a tadpole.
🦟 I like to eat bugs.
💚 I'm often green.

animal.question: I roar and I am the king of the jungle. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦁 I have a big mane.
🍖 I eat meat.
👑 I am a big cat.

animal.question: I have a shell and move very slowly. What am I?

hints.text: 🐢 I carry my house on my back.
🥬 I like to eat lettuce.
🏡 I can hide inside my shell.

animal.question: I fly at night and can see very well, even when it's dark. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦉 I say 'Hoo'.
🌲 I live in trees.
🐭 I like to eat mice.

animal.question: I build dams and have big teeth to chew on wood. What am I?

hints.text: 🦫 I am a rodent.
🪵 I use logs to build my home.
💧 I live in the water.

animal.question: I'm a marsupial that hops and carries my baby in a pouch. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦘 I live in Australia.
🌱 I eat plants.
👶 I carry my joey with me.
